h2_title: Where to use Mind Cores in Black Myth: Wukong
content: This will cause him to move on to the Cellar area of the Crouching Tiger Temple. From there, you will need to obtain both the Keeness of Tiger and Sterness of Stone Key Items from defeating the Tiger Vanguard and Stone Vanguard bosses along the chapter's main story path.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mind_Core.md', within the main section titled 'Mind Core', specifically from the subsection 'Where to use Mind Cores in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
This will cause him to move on to the Cellar area of the Crouching Tiger Temple. From there, you will need to obtain both the Keeness of Tiger and Sterness of Stone Key Items from defeating the Tiger Vanguard and Stone Vanguard bosses along the chapter's main story path.
